metadata.subject: The dark truth behind wildlife tourism

organizations: U.S. House Committee on Oversight and Accountability

relationships.description: Flipboard sending curated news content to a subscriber

analysis.purpose: To deliver curated news content and promote Flipboard's services
analysis.significance: Routine marketing email from a news aggregation service showing the type of content being consumed

notable_quotes: Captive wild animal encounters are hugely popular, thanks partly to social media. But our investigation shows many creatures lead dismal lives.
I don't know anyone in their twenties who has the savings for a down payment without family help.

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion present

illegal_activity.description: This is a routine news aggregation email containing links to various news articles. No first-hand illegal activity is discussed or evidenced by the sender.

details: References to multiple news organizations and journalists: National Geographic, Vox, Time, LA Times, USA Today, BuzzFeed News, The Guardian, The Players' Tribune, Atlas Obscura

public_knowledge.context: This appears to be a standard news aggregation email containing publicly available news articles from mainstream publications

analysis.summary: This is a routine Flipboard newsletter email sent to jeevacation@gmail.com on June 4, 2019, containing curated news articles on various topics including wildlife tourism, UFOs, Jeopardy champion James Holzhauer, and other cultural subjects. The email serves as a marketing communication from Flipboard to engage subscribers with content recommendations.
